main-poster.text: An authentic vacation in the midst of Ukrainian color!

swiper.text: Polonyny Carpathians, in the village of Oriv in the middle of the mountains there is a cozy corner for unforgettable experiences. Real Ukrainian mountains, homemade cheese-making on polony, waterfalls and ancient trees are waiting for you.

second-poster.text: Active recreation in unusual locations. Pristine nature and local flavor will give you unforgettable impressions.

notiflix.title: Thank you
notiflix.message: Our representative will contact you shortly at your number
